title: Home Lab: Using NETCONF/YANG from Your Desktop OS
slug: Understand and perform the steps to make your home lab desktop OS ready for basic experiments using NETCONF/YANG, managing networking devices in both a DevNet Sandbox and in your own home lab.

files.title: Test SSH and NETCONF Access to a DevNet Sandbox
Test the Python ncclient Library from Your Computer to the Sandbox
Configuring a Network Device to Support NETCONF/YANG
